channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-14953] Parquet table source should use schema type to build FilterPredicate
item.description:
The issue happens when the data type of value in predicate inferred from SQL doesn't match the parquet schema. For example, foo is a long type, foo < 1 is the predicate. Literal will be recognized as an integration. It causes the parquet FilterPredicate is mistakenly created for the column of Integer type. Then, the exception comes.

item.summary: Parquet table source should use schema type to build FilterPredicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

dian.fu I can find in 1.10 branch: FLINK-14953[formats] use table type to build parquet FilterPredicate
lzljs3620320 You're right. I missed it. Thanks for your information!
